actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to provide for representation in certain collateral and appellate proceedings before courts of the United States.

summary.text: Provides that any person subject to revocation of parole, in custody as a material witness, or seeking specified forms of relief before courts of the United States shall be furnished representation when financially unable to obtain adequate representation.

titles.title: A bill to provide for representation in certain collateral and appellate proceedings before courts of the United States.
